events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me and I no longer wish to keep it.
The case has been tagged under the refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back related to an ill-fitting product.
A customer service agent specializing in refund issues has been assigned to handle the request promptly and assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund smoothly, we also need to know the condition of the jacket and if you still have the original packaging.
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is unworn with the tags still attached inside the original package.
We have reviewed your details and can offer a full refund once you return the jacket. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to make the return process easier.
That sounds great, thank you for helping me with the prepaid label. I'll send the jacket back as soon as I receive it.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Hi again! Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and everything was satisfactory with the process. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have confirmed the refund went through successfully and the customer is satisfied, this case will be marked as closed. Thank you for contacting support!
